document.docAuthor: El-Hawagry, Magdi S. & Al Dhafer, Hathal M.
document.masterDocTitle: The family Bombyliidae in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Diptera: Brachycera: Asiloidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The family Bombyliidae in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Diptera: Brachycera: Asiloidea)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Spogostylum
Macquart, 1840 : 53
. Type species:
Spogostylum mystaceum Macquart, 1840
, by monotypy.

subSubSection.paragraph: Hosts: Solitary bees and wasps, egg-pods of Acrididae and their Meloidae predators, cocoon of pyralid and its braconid parasitoids ( Yeates & Greathead 1997 ).

Spogostylum candidum ( Sack, 1909 )
( Fig. 11 )

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Psamatamoeba candida
Sack, 1909 : 538
. Type locality: Iran .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Egypt [as ”Gebel Elba”], Saudi Arabia [as South-western part], United Arab Emirates . OR: Pakistan . PA: Egypt , Iran , Turkey .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Jabal Shada Al A’Ala Protected Area (Al-Mekhwa Gov.).
Dates of collection: June.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Argyramoeba dagomba
Bowden, 1964 : 93
. Type locality: Ghana .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Chad , Ivory Coast , Eritrea , Ethiopia , Ghana , Kenya , Niger , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Somalia , Sudan , Yemen .

Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Aqabet Al-Baha-Tihama (Al-Mekhwa Gov.), Baljurash City (Baljurashi Gov.). Asir : Muhaiel City (Muhaiel Gov.).
Makkah : Taief City, Taief escarpment (Taief Gov.), Wadi Dogah (Qunfodah Gov.), Wadi Turabah (Turabah Gov.)
.
Dates of collection: Throughout the year.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthrax isis
Meigen, 1820 : 164
. Type locality: “ Oesterreich ” [probably = Austria ].

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Mali , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”]. PA: Algeria , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Belgium , Croatia , Cyprus , Egypt , France , Greece , Gruzia , Israel , Italy , Kazakhstan , Kyrgyz Republic , Libya , Macedonia , Malta , Morocco , Portugal , Saudi Arabia , Spain , Syria , Tajikistan , Tunisia , Turkey , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan , former Yugoslavia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Jabal Shada Al A’Ala Protected Area (Al-Mekhwa Gov.). Riyadh : Rawdhat Khorim (Rimah Gov.), nr. Riyadh City ( Riyadh Gov.).
Dates of collection: March to July.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Argyromoeba niphas
Hermann, 1907 : 194
. Type locality: Transcaspien.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Eritrea , Mauritania , Oman , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Somalia , Yemen . OR: Pakistan . PA: Egypt , Israel , Saudi Arabia , Tajikistan , Turkey , Turkmenistan .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : nr. Al-Mekhwa City (Al-Mekhwa Gov.). Jazan : Jazan : Abu-Arish (Abu-Arish Gov.), nr. Jazan City ( Jazan Gov.). Riyadh : Rawdhat Khorim (Rimah Gov.) ( Riyadh Gov.).
Dates of collection: Throughout the year.

Spongostylum niphoides Greathead, 1980b: 321
. Type locality: Saudi Arabia .
Distribution: PA: Saudi Arabia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Haiel: Haiel City, Mugheida (Haiel Gov.). North Borders: Lina (Rafha' Gov.).
Dates of collection: April and May.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthrax ocyale
Wiedemann, 1828 : 285
. Type locality: Egypt or Sudan [as “Nubien”].

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Oman , Somalia , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Sudan , United Arab Emirates , Yemen . PA: Egypt , Iran , Israel , Jordan , Libya , Palestine ( West Bank ), Saudi Arabia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Al-Mekhwa City, (Al-Mekhwa Gov.). Asir : nr. Abha. Makkah : Jeddah (Jeddah Gov.), Taief escarpment (Taief Gov.). Riyadh : Al-Kharj City (Al-Kharj Gov.).
Dates of collection: April to November.

bibRefCitation.author: Sack, P.
bibRefCitation.refString: Sack, P. (1909) Die palaearktischen Spongostylinen. Abhandlungen herausgeben von der Senckenbergischen Naturforschenden Gesellschaft, 30, 501 - 548.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Spongostylum sordidum
Sack, 1909 : 514
. Type locality: Iran .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Oman , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”]. PA: Afghanistan , Egypt , Iran , Saudi Arabia , Tajikistan , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan .
Saudi Arabian localities: Asir : Muhaiel City (Muhaiel Gov.). Makkah : Khulais City (Khulais Gov.).
Dates of collection: April and December.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthrax tripunctata Wiedemann in
Meigen, 1820 : 166
. Type locality: Russia .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”]. PA: Afghanistan , Albania , Algeria , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan , Bosnia-Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Egypt , France , Greece (incl. Ithaca), Gruzia , Israel , Italy , Kyrgyz Republic , Libya , Macedonia , Malta , Moldova , Morocco , Russia , Saudi Arabia , Spain , Switzerland , Syria , Tajikistan , Turkey , Turkmenistan , Ukraine , Uzbekistan .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Jabal Shada Al A’Ala Protected Area (Al-Mekhwa Gov.).
Dates of collection: June and September.
